# multichannelAudioMode

**Instance Property**

The multichannel audio mode to apply when recording audio.

## Declaration

```swift
var multichannelAudioMode: AVCaptureMultichannelAudioMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property only takes effect when the system routes audio through the built-in microphone. The system ignores the value when an external microphone is in use.

The default value is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureMultichannelAudioMode/none], which indicates to use single channel audio recording.

## Configuring audio properties

- **isMultichannelAudioModeSupported(_:)**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the input supports the specified multichannel audio mode.
- **AVCaptureMultichannelAudioMode**: Constants that indicate the modes of multichannel audio.
- **isWindNoiseRemovalSupported**
- **isWindNoiseRemovalEnabled**
